edge: Movie's Summary refers to the brief description or preview of a movie that provides an overview of its plot, characters, and genre.
Details refer to specific information about a movie, such as its cast, crew, production house, release date, etc.
Here refers to the current location or position where the Details of the Movie are being provided or displayed.
Message is any form of communication, such as text, audio, video, etc., that can be displayed on a device's screen. The Message may contain information about the reasons why it is being displayed.
There may be other reasons besides those already mentioned that can cause this message to be displayed.
